overview: 20 years in the making! Between Witchfinder 1 and Witchfinder 2, the two movies star almost every WAVE leading lady we have ever had including Clancey McCauley, Chris Stonage, Pamela Sutch, Laura Giglio, mother & daughter Scream Queens Terri Lewandowski and Christine Cavalier, Lonna Cottrell, Dawn Murphy, Tina Krause, and Cristie Clark! The killings have started again and innocent women are being electrocuted, burned to death, drowned, and hanged! Beth Christian (Dawn Murphy), a newspaper reporter, is sent undercover by her editor (Pamela Sutch) to discover the truth about the cult and who’s behind it all!
title: Witchfinder 2
